name: @joergpatz/about-me
description: Source code for my personal website

scripts.postexport: cp temp/CNAME out && cp temp/keybase.txt out
scripts.deploy: npm run build && npm run export && git add out/ && git commit -m "deploy to remote ghpages" && git subtree push --prefix out --squash git@github.com:joergpatz/joergpatz.github.io.git master
